name: ui
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
abbreviation for user interface: the way in which the information on a computer, phone, etc. and instructions on how to use it are arranged on the screen and shown to the user: Generally I found this UI to be clear, functional, and pretty self-explanatory. When you design your UIs, make sure that you pay close attention to how you talk to your user.
More examplesFewer examplesI only wish the company would work on its UI and really consider how people interact with its displays.You may need to present a multi-page UI that requires user input.A standard, easy-to-use UI lets users browse files in a consistent way across apps and providers.He pointed out that users should not have to adapt to new UI conventions when old ones served us so well for so long.You must ensure that your apps offer the basic UI design, features, and functions expected by Android users.
